column1: Subsequently, the two accused had been charged in MC Ampara Case Number
The charge against  the first accused was that he, on 25th August 2017,
used the loader numbered EP ZA-5559 to dig soil without a permit, and
thereby committed an offence punishable in terms of section 63 (1) of the
Mines and Minerals Act No. 33 of 1992 as amended by the Amendment
The charge against the 2nd accused was that he, at the same time and at
the same transaction, transported the soil that was digged, using a lorry
numbered  EP  LL-44168  without  a  permit,  and  thereby  committed  an
offence punishable in terms of section 63 (1) of the Act mentioned above.
